title: SMC_TriggerPosition (Union)
text:
TYPE SMC_TriggerPosition : UNION
Defines a trigger position.

rows.Name: MvtPosition
rows.Comment: The relative or absolute position, only defined ifSMC_TriggerPositionTypeis MvtRelative or MvtDistance.

rows.Name: Plane
rows.Comment: The plane of intersection, only defined ifSMC_TriggerPositionTypeis PlaneIntersection.
